scripts.postinstall: npm install --prefix backend && npm install --prefix frontend-govt
scripts.dev: concurrently "npm run docker-dev" "npm run on-frontend-govt dev" "npm run on-backend dev"
scripts.lint: npm run on-backend -- lint && npm run on-frontend-govt -- lint
scripts.lint:fix: npm run on-backend -- lint:fix && npm run on-frontend-govt -- lint:fix
scripts.test: npm run on-backend -- test && npm run on-frontend-govt -- test
scripts.build: npm run on-backend -- build && npm run on-frontend-govt -- build
scripts.coverage: npm run on-backend -- test:cov && cat backend/coverage/lcov.info > lcov.info
